summary: Two brothers, one cold and ruthless, the other sensitive and reluctant, and their brutal misadventures.
cast: Kim Bodnia|Dejan Cukic|Nikolaj Lie Kaas|Tomas Villum Jensen|Peter Gantzler|Trine Dyrholm|Line Kruse|Brian Patterson|Søren Sætter-Lassen|Lester Wiese|Jesper Christensen|Lasse Lunderskov|Preben Harris|Slavko Labovic|Zarko Labovic|Vasilije Bojicic|Vojkan Fatic|Nikola Labovic|Milutin Garevic|Anna-Britt Mathiasen|Martin Spang Olsen|Red Warszawa|Niels Brinch|Emil Øigaard|Erik Holmey|B.S. Christiansen|Jonas Schmidt|Jesper Find|Christina Birksø
title: I Kina spiser de hunde
